title: Wall Street slips under weight of tech, crypto losses
description: NEW YORK -- The U.S. stock market sank Monday as Nvidia and other superstars created by the frenzy around artificial-intelligence technology dimmed some more.
content:
NEW YORK -- The U.S. stock market sank Monday as Nvidia and other superstars created by the frenzy around artificial-intelligence technology dimmed some more.

title: Don’t blindly trust everything AI tools say, warns Alphabet boss
description: Sundar Pichai says artificial intelligence models are ‘prone to some errors’ and warns of impact if AI bubble bursts
content:
The head of Google’s parent company has said people should not “blindly trust” everything artificial intelligence tools tell them.

title: Microsoft AI chief Mustafa Suleyman warns against rise of artificial superintelligence: Here’s why
description: Microsoft’s AI chief, Mustafa Suleyman, has raised a serious warning about the future of artificial intelligence.

title: Barry Callebaut to use NotCo AI to develop chocolate recipes
description: (Reuters) -Switzerland's Barry Callebaut said on Tuesday it would partner with Chilean start-up NotCo AI to utilise artificial intelligence in recipe development, as it battles high cocoa prices and weakening demand for its cocoa products.
content:

title: Parasocial is the word of a year led by influencers and chatbots
description: Cambridge Dictionaries’ word of the year describes the one-sided relationship fans have with celebrities, experts on social media and artificial intelligence
content:
The term was chosen as the word of the year after a spike in searches for it on the Cambridge Dictionary website.
Parasocial relationships are nothing new. The term was coined in 1956 by Donald Horton and Richard Wohl, sociologists at the University ... [5883 chars]

description: Switzerland's Barry Callebaut said on Tuesday it would partner with Chilean start-up NotCo AI to utilise artificial intelligence in recipe development, as it battles high cocoa prices and weakening demand for its cocoa products.

title: Asian shares sink, tracking tech-led sell-off on Wall Street
description: BANGKOK, Nov 18:  Asian shares tumbled on Tuesday, with benchmarks in Tokyo and Seoul sinking more than 3%, after Nvidia and other artificial-intelligence -related shares pulled US stocks lower.   US futures dropped, with the contract for the S&P 500 down 0.6% while the future for the Dow Jones Industrial Average was down 0.4%. Computer chip giant Nvidia, at the center of the craze over AI, is due to report its earnings on Wednesday. Worries that stock prices of such […]
